item.title: Product Rental Single
item.dc:creator: duong
item.content:encoded:
Transportation 1 review

Trucking

$190.00 - $260.00
Add to wishlist

Explore seamless logistics with our top-tier trucking service. Timely deliveries, state-of-the-art trucks, and a commitment to excellence—your cargo, our priority.

Included in the Price

Additional Driver
Map
Theft Insurance

Shipping Policy

  1. Pay only 15% now, and the rest at the destination.
  2. Cancel up-to 48 hours before pick-up and get a full refund.
  3. This car requires a licence category A1, or equivalent.
  4. You’ll need to be at least 18 years old to rent it with 12 months driving experience
  5. A refundable security-deposit is required ( 24 € debit-card, ) on pickup.

Reviews are only visible in a single product page

Booking Form Enquiry Form
Pay 100% Deposit Option 50% Per item Total:  Items available:

Checkout our new services

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

Our Location

GET a quote

  • Ocean Service
  • Courier Service
0+

Years Working Experience

About us

Provide Transportation Services Since 2008

As a leading logistics provider, our company specializes in seamless cargo transportation. With a global network, we ensure timely, secure, and cost-effective delivery solutions for diverse industries.

Read more

Affordable Cost

Providing the cheapest price on the market

Shot Time Delivery

Delivery at exact time and location

Support 24/7

Support via phone, email, social

Working Process

Working Process for services

01

Online Quote

An online quote is an estimate of the cost of a product or service provided by a business.

02

Picking Product

Picking a product refers to the process of selecting a specific from a range of products.

03

Product Packaging

Product packaging refers to the materials and design used to protect, product to customers.

04

Product Transport

Product transport refers to the process of moving products from one location to another

05

Delivery

Deliver the goods to the specified address as per the recipient's request.

All Services

Quick Booking

  • Trucking
  • Air freight
  • Sea freight
  • Courier Service
Booking Form Enquiry Form
Pay 100% Deposit Option 50% Per item Total:  Items available:

Explore seamless logistics with our top-tier trucking service. Timely deliveries, state-of-the-art trucks, and a commitment to excellence—your cargo, our priority.

Read More

Some frequent questions

FAQ Services

How long does shipping usually take ? Shipping times can vary depending on several factors, and understanding the typical delivery timelines can help manage your expectations and plan accordingly. Can I track my shipment online ? When you make a purchase online, retailers typically send a confirmation email with tracking details.
This email contains a unique tracking number and a link to the carrier’s website or a tracking portal on the retailer’s site. What if my goods are damaged upon arrival ? By documenting the damage, contacting the retailer, and keeping the packaging materials, you increase the likelihood of a swift and satisfactory resolution to your damaged delivery dilemma. Is insurance included in the shipping cost ? By default, Remons assumes a maximum liability of $100 for every package it ships, to cover potential loss or damage

Customers feedback

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have alteration in some injected or words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrang hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable.

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type simen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting.

item.title: Trucking
item.dc:creator: duong
item.content:encoded: Explore seamless logistics with our top-tier trucking service. Timely deliveries, state-of-the-art trucks, and a commitment to excellence—your cargo, our priority.
item.excerpt:encoded: Explore seamless logistics with our top-tier trucking service. Timely deliveries, state-of-the-art trucks, and a commitment to excellence—your cargo, our priority.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Additional Driver Map Theft Insurance

1. Pay only 15% now, and the rest at the destination.
  2. Cancel up-to 48 hours before pick-up and get a full refund.
  3. This car requires a licence category A1, or equivalent.
  4. You'll need to be at least 18 years old to rent it with 12 months driving experience
  5. A refundable security-deposit is required ( 24 € debit-card, ) on pickup.
